data.title: Los Perales Elementary PTA
data.text:
Join Our Hospitality Program: Celebrate and Support Our Staff!

The PTA's Hospitality Program is all about supporting our teachers and staff while creating a welcoming atmosphere for everyone. This year, we’ve made things easier by using PTA funds to cater quarterly lunches, so our educators can enjoy a great meal without any hassle. We’re also enhancing key events, like back-to-school gatherings and the Halloween parade, with DoorDash coffee and other refreshments. Our aim is to celebrate our hardworking staff and ensure that every parent and member of our community feels valued throughout the year.

hospitality manager needed

We’re seeking a volunteer to coordinate these events. It’s a wonderful opportunity to support our educators and enhance community spirit. If you’re organized and enthusiastic, we’d love to hear from you!
